p.s: What can and should we do to stop the environmental pollution?
Our earth is destroying as a result of the huge growth and development of science and technology.
We have to act immediatlyimmediately - before we lost the ecological balance and earth destroy.
As aan easy first step, we could stop driving cars and use bicycles.
Through the lower fuel consumption, the atmosphere will getting fewer effects.
Furthermore, it is also good for ourselves, to do more sport and train our muscles.
As an another idea, we could try to buy no plastic or too many clothes.
These ideas are small steps, you can do in your all day life.
